DOC.brief_summary: This study evaluate acute symptomatic improvement cognitive performance healthy elderly participant mild-to-moderate Alzheimer 's disease . A four-week pilot study first evaluate CogState computerized cognitive battery participant receive treatment . After completion pilot study , participant randomize receive Placebo , Donepezil 5 mg , MK-0249 7.5 mg , MK-0249 25 mg. DOC.brief_title: A Study Evaluate Effects MK-0249 Alzheimer 's Disease Medication Cognitive Function Adults With Alzheimer 's Disease ( MK-0249-023 )
DOC.criteria: Patient Specific : Female reproductive potential Male female partner ( ) child bear potential , agree use acceptable method contraception study Has least 10 year education work history Has nonsmoker use nicotine least 6 month Has diagnosis mildtomoderate Alzheimer 's Disease Has reliable caregiver consent accompany patient clinic visit , provide information study staff , return followup visit procedure Healthy Elderly Volunteer Specific : Is good general health Has clinically significant abnormality electrocardiogram ( ECG ) Participant Specific : Has history neurological disorder Alzheimer 's disease Is live nurse home Has history stroke Has history psychotic disorder , active major depressive disorder , history schizophrenia Has history sleep disorder Has history cardiovascular disorder Has history malignancy Is participate participate study investigational compound , device , vaccine Alzheimer 's disease Consumes great 6 serving caffeine ( coffee , tea cola etc . ) per day Consumes great 3 alcoholic beverage per day Has major surgery , donate loss blood past 8 week Healthy Elderly Volunteer Specific : Is mentally legally incapacitate , significant emotional problem , history psychiatric disorder last 510 year
